description: Astronomers using JWST have discovered LAP2, a tiny star-forming complex magnified by Abell 2744. With extremely low metallicity and a size under 33 light years, it provides rare insight into conditions resembling the early universe, offering clues about how the first stars formed and enriched galaxies with heavier elements
title: JWST Identifies Compact, Metal-Poor Star-Forming Region Tracing Back to Early Universe

description: NASA’s Artemis programme goes beyond Apollo by planning longer lunar missions to test spacecraft, life-support, and logistics for Mars. With Gateway, lunar ice harvesting, and global partnerships, Artemis aims to simulate deep-space challenges. These lessons will directly guide future crewed journeys to the Red Planet and beyond.
title: NASA’s Artemis Prepares Crews for Future Mars Missions

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 offers up to 80 percent off on mobile accessories. Many wireless headsets from top brands are currently available at reduced prices on Amazon. Shoppers can avail exchange offers, coupon discounts, and EMI offers to reduce the prices further. The sale will open for all shoppers on September 23.
title: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025: Early Deals on Wireless Headsets Revealed

description: Demon Slayer: Infinity Castle is an anime movie that has been written and directed by Hikaru Kondo. The movie revolves around the battle between Demon Slayer and the Lord of the Demons.
title: Demon Slayer: Infinity Castle OTT Release: Know When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Written and directed by Srujan Attada, Kanyakumari is a Telugu romance drama that stars Sreecharan Rachakonda and Geeth Saini in the lead roles. Now Streaming on Prime Video.
title: Kanyakumari Now Streaming on This OTT Platform: Know Everything About This Telugu Romance Drama

description: In 2024, NASA’s Perseverance rover captured the first green aurora on Mars. Now scientists can forecast these rare events by tracking powerful solar storms. Beyond their glow, auroras signal radiation that could endanger astronauts. This breakthrough forecasting method is crucial for protecting future human explorers on the Red Planet.
title: Researchers Develop Method to Predict Rare Green Auroral Events on Mars

description: Microsoft has announced the slate of games joining Xbox Game Pass in the second half of September. These include RoadCraft, Frostpunk 2, Hades, and more. Several other titles available to higher tier members are coming to Game Pass Standard tier, including Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3.
title: Xbox Game Pass Wave 2 Titles for September Include RoadCraft, Frostpunk 2 and Hades

description: Amazon’s Great Indian Festival 2025, the company’s biggest annual sale in India, begins September 23 and brings major smartphone discounts across brands like Apple, Samsung, Realme, and Xiaomi. Deals also extend to laptops, tablets, wearables, and earbuds. Among highlights are offers on the OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13s, and OnePlus Nord 5, available with attractive bundled discounts.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: OnePlus 13s, OnePlus Nord 5 Deals Revealed

description: Apple's MacBook Pro model with an OLED display, which could be powered by the company's M6 chip, is expected to launch by early 2027. However, a market analyst has now revealed that the rumoured laptop might sport a touchscreen, too, which might close the gap between the tech giant's laptops and tablets. The analyst expected to laptop to enter the mass production phase by late 2026. The company is also said to be working on an affordable MacBook variant.
title: Apple's OLED MacBook Pro Model Could Feature a Touchscreen, Analyst Says

description: India has made cybersecurity audits mandatory for cryptocurrency exchanges, custodians, and intermediaries following a surge in cyber heists. The Financial Intelligence Unit-India (FIU-IND) has directed firms to hire CERT-In-approved auditors as part of compliance under the PMLA. Industry leaders welcomed the move as a step toward stronger safeguards, though experts caution about challenges in crypto-specific security assessments.
title: Government Makes Cybersecurity Audits Mandatory for Crypto Exchanges Due to Rising Risks

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 will begin on September 23. Ahead of the annual sale, the e-commerce platform is offering multiple products at reduced prices. Top brands like Godrej and Samsung are selling their refrigerators with up to 55 percent discount on Amazon now. Shoppers can also avail exchange discounts, coupon offers and bank based discounts.
title: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025: Samsung, Godrej, Haier Offer Early Discounts on Refrigerators

description: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag remake will reportedly launch in early 2026. The project is said to be close to the end of its production. According to a new report, the game will feature RPG-style mechanics seen in recent Assassin's Creed games.
title: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag Remake Will Reportedly Feature RPG Mechanics, Launch in Early 2026

description: Nothing’s sub-brand CMF has announced that it will launch its new over-the-ear headphones, dubbed CMF Headphone Pro, on September 29. Along with the announcement, the company has also teased the design and the colourway of the upcoming headphones.
title: CMF Headphone Pro India Launch Date Set for September 29; Design Teased

description: ISRO chief Dr. V. Narayanan inaugurated OrbitAID’s new Bengaluru lab, India’s largest commercial test site for on-orbit refueling and docking. The 6,500-sq-ft facility features advanced cleanrooms and RPOD testbeds. OrbitAID’s technology aims to extend satellite lifespans, reduce space debris, and create a circular, sustainable space economy.
title: ISRO Chairman Opens OrbitAID Research Facility to Boost On-Orbit Servicing in India

description: Meta Connect 2025 is set to kick off tomorrow (Thursday). It is the company’s annual event where it showcases its latest hardware developments, AI solutions, and metaverse technologies. At Connect 2025, Meta is reported to announce a new pair of smart glasses with a built-in display. It could also introduce the rumoured Oakley Meta Sphaera, geared towards cyclists and other athletes.
title: Meta Connect 2025 Tomorrow: How to Watch Livestream, Expected Announcements

description: Nothing OS 4.0, based on Android 16, has been officially announced. It brings a redesigned lock screen and a  new AI Usage Dashboard. The Nothing OS 4.0 features an upgraded Camera and a smarter Gallery with the TrueLens Engine. It offers an Extra Dark. Nothing has confirmed that they will launch the Open Beta testing programme soon.
title: Nothing OS 4.0 Announced; Brings New AI Dashboard to Track AI Usage, Extra Dark Mode and More

description: In mid-September 2025, a “secret” magnetic island inside a solar coronal hole triggered a powerful G3 storm. The surprise event sent dazzling auroras across North America, seen as far south as Illinois. Researchers say the rare polarity patch intensified solar winds, making aurora season’s start spectacular.
title: Solar Storm From Hidden Magnetic Island on the Sun Surprises Scientists

description: The UK and the US are set to deepen cooperation on digital assets, including cryptocurrencies and stablecoins, after talks between Chancellor Rachel Reeves and US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent. The partnership aims to align regulations, boost investment flows, and strengthen London’s competitiveness amid rising transatlantic market rivalry.
title: UK, US to Deepen Cooperation on Digital Assets Amidst US President Donald Trump’s State Visit

description: The Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 kicks off on September 23. It can be a great avenue if you wish to upgrade your existing home appliances. Ahead of the sale, the e-commerce giant has announced some great deals on ACs from brands such as Carrier, Hitachi, and LG. Customers can also avail of a 10 percent discount on SBI Credit Card transactions.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Deals on ACs from Carrier, Hitachi, LG, and More Brands Revealed Ahead of Sale

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival starts on September 23, offering Prime members in India 24-hour early access. The sale includes major discounts on laptops, smartphones, smart TVs, gaming consoles, and PC accessories, along with exchange offers and other benefits. SBI debit and credit cardholders can claim an extra 10 percent instant discount, while additional savings are possible through EMI options, coupons, or exchange deals. We’ve rounded up some of the best early offers on PC accessories ahead of the festival.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Early Deals on PC Accessories Revealed

description: Amazon’s Great Indian Festival 2025 begins September 23, with Prime members getting early access. A major highlight is the OnePlus 13, launched at Rs. 69,999, now available for Rs. 57,999 with SBI card discounts. Other OnePlus models, including the 13s, Nord 4, Nord 5, and Nord CE series, will also see price cuts during the sale.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: OnePlus 13 Deal We've All Been Waiting For Is Finally Here

description: Oppo K13s has been unveiled by the Chinese smartphone maker. The phone is currently only available in China in two colourways and RAM options. It is powered by a Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 SoC, paired with a 7,000mAh battery. The new Oppo handset supports 80W wired fast charging support, too. It features a 6.8-inch full-HD+ (2,800x1,280 pixels) AMOLED display and has a dual-rear camera unit.
title: Oppo K13s With 7,000mAh Battery, Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 SoC Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Instamart, the quick commerce platform, has already announced that its Quick India Movement Sale 2025 will start on September 19 and conclude on September 28. Days before the sale event starts, the company has revealed deals on several smartphones from brands like Apple, Realme, Oppo, OnePlus, Redmi, Xiaomi, and Samsung. Customers will be able to avail themselves of several cashback offers, on top of the bank discounts.
title: Instamart Quick India Movement Sale 2025 Goes Live on September 19 With Jaw-Dropping Prices on iPhone 16, OnePlus 13R, and More

description: Apple launched the iPhone 17 Pro and iPhone 17 Pro Max on September 9. Along with its flagship smartphones, the Cupertino tech giant also launched the new ‘40W Dynamic Power Adapter with 60W Max’ charging adaptor, which is claimed to charge the Pro models up to 50 percent in 20 minutes. In an alleged "hands-on review" of the adaptor, a Reddit user has revealed that it uses the AVS technology, while only providing 60W charging speed for about 18 minutes, and reaching 82 degrees Celsius temperatures.
title: iPhone 17 Series Might Only Support Faster Charging With Apple’s New 60W Adaptor For Limited Time

description: Redmi 15R 5G launched in China with a 6,000mAh battery and a 6.9-inch display. It runs on a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset, paired with up to 12GB RAM and a maximum 256GB storage. A 13-megapixel rear camera unit, 5-megapixel selfie shooter, and IP64-rated build are the other key highlights of the phone.
title: Redmi 15R 5G Launched With MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC, 6,000mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: WhatsApp has rolled out a new update of its app for iOS, adding a feature that lets users schedule notification reminders for messages. This helps highlight important information and tasks in chats, preventing them from getting lost in active conversations. Currently, the feature is available to select iOS users and is expected to expand in the coming weeks, according to a WhatsApp tracker. Meta recently tested a similar reminder feature for Android users.
title: WhatsApp for iOS Adds Notification Reminders for Messages, Meetings, and Deadlines

description: Bitcoin traded around $116,700 (roughly Rs. 1.01 crore) on Wednesday, holding steady as markets awaited the US Federal Reserve’s policy outcome. Ethereum hovered near $4,491 (roughly Rs. 3.89 lakh), while altcoins like Solana, Dogecoin, and XRP displayed mixed sentiment. Institutional inflows, tighter liquidity, and macroeconomic signals continue to shape the market outlook.
title: Bitcoin Climbs to $116,700 as Ethereum, Altcoins Consolidate Ahead of US Fed Policy Decision

description: OpenAI on Tuesday announced new safety measures for children and teenagers using ChatGPT, while confirming a different approach for adults. The company said users over 18 will be treated “like adults,” meaning the chatbot may provide sensitive information, such as on self-harm, if framed as educational. OpenAI also teased a privilege system restricting employee access to adult conversations.
title: Is the TikTok War Over? US and China Reportedly Find a Path Forward

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra leaks keep pouring in. Most recently, alleged cases of the handset have leaked online. They suggest that the phone will be equipped with a new rear camera bar design. They show the handset with a hole-punch display and rounded corners. It is expected to come with the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra With Redesigned Camera Module Seen in Leaked Case Renders

description: Xiaomi 15T is set to launch globally on September 25. Ahead of its debut, specifications of the handset have been leaked. As per a tipster, the handset will come with a MediaTek Dimensity 8400 Ultra chipset, running on HyperOS. It is said to sport a 120Hz AMOLED screen and a Leica Summilux optical lens. The tipster further suggests that the Xiaomi 15T will pack a 5,500mAh battery. It may support fast charging at 67W.
title: Xiaomi 15T Specifications Leaked; Tipped to Launch With MediaTek Dimensity 8400 Ultra SoC

description: Flipkart's Big Billion Days Sale 2025 begins on September 23 in India. Ahead of the sale, the e-commerce giant has updated the pages of the iPhone 16, iPhone 16 Pro, and iPhone 16 Pro Max, with the discounted prices that will go live during the sale. Buyers will be able to purchase the iPhone 16 for as low as Rs. 51,999 on Flipkart.
title: Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale 2025: Discounts on iPhone 16 Pro, iPhone 16 Pro Max Listed Ahead of Sale

description: Google is testing a new Windows search app through Search Labs that launches with Alt + Space to quickly search local files, Google Drive, and the web. It installs like Chrome, requires sign-in, and integrates Lens for screen-based image searches and translations. AI Mode handles complex queries, while users can switch between results like images, videos, and shopping, with light or dark themes. The app adds a resizable desktop search bar.
title: Google Search App for Windows Launched With Spotlight-Like Features

description: OpenAI on Tuesday announced new safety measures for children and teenagers using ChatGPT, while confirming a different approach for adults. The company said users over 18 will be treated “like adults,” meaning the chatbot may provide sensitive information, such as on self-harm, if framed as educational. OpenAI also teased a privilege system restricting employee access to adult conversations.
title: OpenAI Plans Stricter Protections for Teens, Expands Privacy for Adult Users

description: Palworld is set to exit early access and get a full version 1.0 release next year. Developer Pocketpair said update 1.0 was in development. The studio said it would address Palworld's "quirks and janks" before releasing version 1.0. The company also said it would release the game's winter update later this year.
title: Palworld to Exit Early Access, Get Version 1.0 Release in 2026, Pocketpair Announces

description: YouTube unveiled several new features and products during its Made on YouTube 2025 event on Tuesday. The Google-owned company announced that it has begun integrating the Google Veo 3 Fast generative artificial intelligence (AI) model into YouTube Shorts, enabling creators to create video backgrounds and clips with sound for free. It also unveiled new features that will help podcasters create video clips and Shorts from different podcast episodes.
title: YouTube Announces New AI-Powered Tools for Shorts Creators, Podcasters at Made on YouTube Event

description: Motorola could be gearing up to launch the Moto G36 soon. The handset is yet to be officially confirmed by the Chinese smartphone brand, but in a new update, the design and specifications of the phone have surfaced on the TENAA certification site. The listing shows the phone with dual rear cameras, a 6.72-inch display and a 6,790mAh battery.
title: Moto G36 Design and Features Revealed by TENAA Listing; Likely to Feature 6,790mAh Battery, 6.72-Inch Display

description: The Xiaomi 17 Pro with model number 25098PN5AC has appeared on Geekbench with Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC, 16GB of RAM, and Android 16-based HyperOS 3. Expected features of the handset include a Leica-backed 50-megapixel triple rear camera setup with an f/1.67 main sensor, an f/3.0 115mm telephoto lens with 5x optical zoom, and a 17mm ultra-wide shooter. It will also feature a secondary rear display and may get a 6.3-inch 120Hz LTPO front screen with 1.1mm bezels and a 6,300mAh battery with 100W wired charging.
title: Xiaomi 17 Pro Appears on Geekbench With Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC, 16GB RAM

description: The iPhone 17 series and iPhone Air were launched by Apple in India and the global markets on September 9. Ingram Micro, Croma, and other retailers in India have now announced their pre-order offers on the handsets. Customers can avail of bank discounts, no-cost EMI options, and exchange benefits.
title: iPhone 17 Series, iPhone Air Pre-Order Discounts Announced by Croma, Ingram Micro India, and Vijay Sales

description: The Vivo V60e is rumoured to launch in India as the successor to the Vivo V50e. According to a report, the handset will be powered by the same Dimensity 7300 SoC as its predecessor, but could pack a significant battery upgrade. It is expected to be available in three colourways. The price of Vivo V60e in India could begin at Rs. 28,999 for the 8GB + 128GB configuration.
title: Vivo V60e Price and Specifications Reportedly Surface Ahead of India Launch

description: Concerns over AI safety persist as developers build ever-more capable models and tout red-teaming and internal safeguards. However, Gadgets 360 found that popular chatbots, ChatGPT, Grok and Meta AI, do not fully follow those protections: when prompted, they produced phishing email content that could be misused for scams, underscoring gaps in practical safety enforcement.
title: AI Chatbots Promoting Cybercrime? ChatGPT, Grok and Meta AI Are Happy to Write Phishing Emails
